cell_line.prompt_description: Cell line is a group of cells that are genetically identical and have been cultured in a laboratory setting. e.g., HeLa, Jurkat, HEK293, etc.

cell_type.prompt_description: Cell type is a classification of cells based on their structure and function, representing normal cells. e.g., neuron, hepatocyte, etc.

tissue.prompt_description: Tissue is a group of cells that work together to perform a specific function in an organism. e.g., lung, liver, heart, etc.

disease.prompt_description: Disease is an abnormal state of the body or its parts that impairs normal function. e.g., lung cancer, down syndrome, etc.
